snippet: Mr. Norris, who will be supervising producer of “Fuse News,” is the latest former employee of MTV to join that program, whose on-air talent also includes Alexa Chung and Jack Osbourne.
abstract: Mr. Norris, who will be supervising producer of “Fuse News,” is the latest former employee of MTV to join that program, whose on-air talent also includes Alexa Chung and Jack Osbourne.

headline.main: MTV Veteran John Norris Joins 'Fuse News'
